text.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 250px; white-space: pre;

rect.style: fill: rgb(239, 83, 80); stroke: rgb(239, 83, 80); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 1;

text.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 250px; white-space: pre;
